page.title: 12 TOURISM IN DORNIE.
page.content: People like to come to see how we live, our hobbies,work and school.They come to see the area and the people in it.The more tourists there are the more money to be spent therefore shops are improved and hotels can open.There are a few improvements to be made to encourage tourism such as Gala Days.Dornie,in the past,held a "Festival of Flowers"There could be a general tidying up and improving of the countryside.But Dornie,Skye,South West Ross and the surrounding area sell themselves due to their natural beauty.Some people oppose tourism.Some tourists leave litter and abuse the countryside but they are a minority. Without tourism the area cannot expand or develop and therefore will slowly die.
